greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} sigma(d)^(n/d).
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k >= 1} sigma(k) * x^k/(1 - sigma(k) * x^k).
If p is prime, a(p) = 2 + p.
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, DivisorSigma[1 , #]^(n/#) &]; Array[a, 43] (* _Amiram Eldar_, May 08 2021 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, May 08 2021
